bibl.title: A Limestone Stela with a Seated Figure Found in Naukratis.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud
bibl.author: HAWASS, Zahi

bibl.note: Registered at the office of Giza Inspectorate. 11,3 cm x 4 cm. The figure represents an erotic act (?), VIIth to IVth century B.C.
HAWASS Zahi, A Limestone Stela with a Seated Figure Found in Naukratis.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 139-143, 1 fig., pl. XXI.
